title: Flash Gordon. Vol. 02
brief_description: Episodes 7 to 13 of this cult movie serial. Episode 7: “Shattering Doom”: In this episode, Flash is tortured and Dale is forced to betray him. He is sent back to the atom furnaces with the order that high voltage wire be connected to his wrist. Episode 8: “Tournament of Death”: Ming arrives in Vultan’s kingdom and Flash fights to earn his freedom in combat with a masked gladiator and a huge orangopoid. Episode 9: “Fighting the Fire Dragon”: Conspiring with Princess Aura, the High Priest gives Flash drops of forgetfulness and has him sent through the Tunnel of Terror to the abode of the sacred Fire Dragon. Episode 10: “The Unseen Peril”: Brought before Ming to choose his bride and unable to remember Dale, Flash goes off with Aura, but is rescued by Zarkov, Dale and Barin. Episode 11: “In the Claws of the Tigron”: Using Zarkov’s invisibility machine Flash releases Vultan from his dungeon prison and rushes to rescue Dale from the claws of the vicious tigron. Episode 12: “Trapped in the Turret”: In this episode Vultan invites Flash and his friends to visit his sky city. Episode 13: “Rocketing to Earth”: In the thirteenth and final episode Flash and his friends take refuge in Zharkov’s laboratory and prepare to leave Mongo for earth.
